citations.desc: ENVIRONMENT ENHANCEMENT TO PROMOTE PSYCHOLOGICAL WELL-BEING.
citations.narrative:
In February of this year, the facility reported the death of an animal due to self-inflicted injury by an enrichment
device. Enrichment options provided to animals must be non-injurious. The facility has taken timely and
appropriate action to prevent such incidents in the future.
An exit interview was conducted with facility representatives.

narrative:
3.81(d)
ENVIRONMENT ENHANCEMENT TO PROMOTE PSYCHOLOGICAL WELL-BEING.
In February of this year, the facility reported the death of an animal due to self-inflicted injury by an enrichment
device.   Enrichment options provided to animals must be non-injurious.  The facility has taken timely and
appropriate action to prevent such incidents  in the future.
An exit interview was conducted with facility representatives.
